00090 typedef struct player_s player_t;

00094   PLAYER_TYPE_XINE,
00095   PLAYER_TYPE_MPLAYER,
00096   PLAYER_TYPE_VLC,
00097   PLAYER_TYPE_GSTREAMER,
00098   PLAYER_TYPE_DUMMY
00099 } player_type_t;

00104   PLAYER_VO_AUTO,

00110   PLAYER_VO_VDPAU
00111 } player_vo_t;

00115   PLAYER_AO_NULL,
00116   PLAYER_AO_AUTO,
00117   PLAYER_AO_ALSA,
00118   PLAYER_AO_OSS
00119 } player_ao_t;
00120 
00122 typedef enum player_event {
00123   PLAYER_EVENT_UNKNOWN,
00124   PLAYER_EVENT_PLAYBACK_START,
00125   PLAYER_EVENT_PLAYBACK_STOP,
00126   PLAYER_EVENT_PLAYBACK_FINISHED,
00127   PLAYER_EVENT_PLAYLIST_FINISHED,
00128   PLAYER_EVENT_PLAYBACK_PAUSE,
00129   PLAYER_EVENT_PLAYBACK_UNPAUSE,
00130 } player_event_t;
00131 
00133 typedef enum {
00134   PLAYER_MSG_NONE,          /* no error messages */
00135   PLAYER_MSG_VERBOSE,       /* super-verbose mode: mostly for debugging */
00136   PLAYER_MSG_INFO,          /* working operations */
00137   PLAYER_MSG_WARNING,       /* harmless failures */
00138   PLAYER_MSG_ERROR,         /* may result in hazardous behavior */
00139   PLAYER_MSG_CRITICAL,      /* prevents lib from working */
00140 } player_verbosity_level_t;
00141 
00165 player_t *player_init (player_type_t type, player_ao_t ao, player_vo_t vo,
00166                        player_verbosity_level_t verbosity, unsigned long winid,
00167                        int (*event_cb) (player_event_t e, void *data));

00198 /***************************************************************************/
00199 /*                                                                         */
00200 /* Media Resource Locater (MRL) Helpers                                    */
00201 /*  MRLs can have multiple types and are used to define a stream           */
00202 /*                                                                         */
00203 /***************************************************************************/
00204 
00210 typedef struct mrl_s mrl_t;
00211 
00213 typedef enum mrl_type {
00214   MRL_TYPE_UNKNOWN,
00215   MRL_TYPE_AUDIO,
00216   MRL_TYPE_VIDEO,
00217   MRL_TYPE_IMAGE,
00218 } mrl_type_t;
00219 
00220 /*
00221  * Support by wrappers
00222  *
00223  *                           GStreamer     MPlayer        VLC         xine
00224  *                         ------------ ------------ ------------ ------------
00225  */
00227 typedef enum mrl_resource {
00228   MRL_RESOURCE_UNKNOWN,
00229 
00230   /* Local Streams */
00231   MRL_RESOURCE_FIFO,        /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00232   MRL_RESOURCE_FILE,        /*  NO           YES          YES          YES  */
00233   MRL_RESOURCE_STDIN,       /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00234 
00235   /* Audio CD */
00236   MRL_RESOURCE_CDDA,        /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00237   MRL_RESOURCE_CDDB,        /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00238 
00239   /* Video discs */
00240   MRL_RESOURCE_DVD,         /*  NO           YES          NO           YES  */
00241   MRL_RESOURCE_DVDNAV,      /*  NO           YES          NO           YES  */
00242   MRL_RESOURCE_VCD,         /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00243 
00244   /* Radio/Television */
00245   MRL_RESOURCE_DVB,         /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00246   MRL_RESOURCE_PVR,         /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00247   MRL_RESOURCE_RADIO,       /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00248   MRL_RESOURCE_TV,          /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00249   MRL_RESOURCE_VDR,         /*  NO           NO           NO           YES  */
00250 
00251   /* Network Streams */
00252   MRL_RESOURCE_FTP,         /*  NO           YES          YES          NO   */
00253   MRL_RESOURCE_HTTP,        /*  NO           YES          YES          NO   */
00254   MRL_RESOURCE_MMS,         /*  NO           YES          YES          NO   */
00255   MRL_RESOURCE_NETVDR,      /*  NO           NO           NO           YES  */
00256   MRL_RESOURCE_RTP,         /*  NO           YES          YES          NO   */
00257   MRL_RESOURCE_RTSP,        /*  NO           YES          YES          NO   */
00258   MRL_RESOURCE_SMB,         /*  NO           YES          YES          NO   */
00259   MRL_RESOURCE_TCP,         /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00260   MRL_RESOURCE_UDP,         /*  NO           YES          YES          NO   */
00261   MRL_RESOURCE_UNSV,        /*  NO           YES          YES          NO   */
00262 } mrl_resource_t;
00263 
00265 typedef struct mrl_resource_local_args_s {
00266   char *location;           /*  NO           YES          YES          YES  */
00267   int playlist;             /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00268 } mrl_resource_local_args_t;
00269 
00271 typedef struct mrl_resource_cd_args_s {
00272   char *device;             /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00273   uint8_t speed;            /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00274   uint8_t track_start;      /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00275   uint8_t track_end;        /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00276 } mrl_resource_cd_args_t;
00277 
00279 typedef struct mrl_resource_videodisc_args_s {
00280   char *device;             /*  NO           YES          NO           YES  */
00281   uint8_t speed;            /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00282   uint8_t angle;            /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00283   uint8_t title_start;      /*  NO           YES          NO           YES  */
00284   uint8_t title_end;        /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00285   uint8_t chapter_start;    /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00286   uint8_t chapter_end;      /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00287   uint8_t track_start;      /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00288   uint8_t track_end;        /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00289   char *audio_lang;         /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00290   char *sub_lang;           /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00291   uint8_t sub_cc;           /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00292 } mrl_resource_videodisc_args_t;
00293 
00295 typedef struct mrl_resource_tv_args_s {
00296   char *device;             /*  NO           NO           NO           YES  */
00297   char *driver;             /*  NO           NO           NO           YES  */
00298   char *channel;            /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00299   uint8_t input;            /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00300   int width;                /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00301   int height;               /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00302   int fps;                  /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00303   char *output_format;      /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00304   char *norm;               /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00305 } mrl_resource_tv_args_t;
00306 
00308 typedef struct mrl_resource_network_args_s {
00309   char *url;                /*  NO           YES          NO           YES  */
00310   char *username;           /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00311   char *password;           /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
00312   char *user_agent;         /*  NO           NO           NO           NO   */
00313 } mrl_resource_network_args_t;
00314 
00316 typedef enum mrl_snapshot {
00317   MRL_SNAPSHOT_JPG,         /*  NO           YES          NO           NO   */
